item.description:
This year we will be having special guests for the Oeshiki service. The Nichiren Order of North America ministers asscoiation members will be joining us. This a wonderful opertunity to meet many Nichiren Shu ministers. Please join us.

Oeshiki - On the way to a hot spa in Hitachi provence from Mt. Minobu to recover his heath, Nichiren Shonin's health declined. He rested at the Ikegami Munenaga's residence in present day Tokyo and could no longer continue his trip. On the morning of October 13, 1282, at 8:00 am, Nichiren Shonin ended his long life of spreading the Lotus Sutra for 60 years. The Oeshiki service is held to express our gratitude to our Founder. We will be holding the holiday service and a vegetarian potluck meal. Everyone is welcome.

www.newenglandbuddhist.org
item.name: Oeshiki Service
